update HOS_patient set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=REAL}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bed_id = #{bedId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, appointmentt_time = #{appointmenttTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, base_desc = #{baseDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spare1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare3 = #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select p.id,p.name,p.no,p.age,p.card_id,p.phone,p.gender,p.base_desc,p.end_time,d.name deptName,b.code bedCode,w1.name doctorName,w2.name nurseName,
p.appointmentt_time,p.status,p.doctor_id,p.bed_id
from HOS_patient p inner join HOS_dept d on p.dept_id = d.id inner join HOS_bed b on p.bed_id = b.id inner join HOS_worker w1 on p.doctor_id = w1.id inner join HOS_worker w2 on p.nurse_id = w2.id
and p.name like '%${name}%' and p.no like '%${no}%' and p.card_id like '%${cardId}%' and p.gender = #{gender} and p.status = #{status} and p.appointmentt_time >= #{startDate} and p.appointmentt_time <= #{endDate} and p.status in(1,2,3) order by p.appointmentt_time desc
